product_name: STM Skinny Fire Kindle Case - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Protect your 7 in. Kindle Fire (sold separately) from scratches and bumps with the lightweight and slim STM Skinny Fire Kindle Case. Snap in your Kindle Fire to the hard-shell backing; soft microsuede lining protects against scratches and bumps. Case allows easy access to ports and control buttons. Foldable front cover lets you prop up your Kindle Fire for viewing or typing. Closeout.
short_description: Protect your 7 in. Kindle Fire (sold separately) from scratches and bumps with the lightweight and slim STM Skinny Fire Kindle Case.
